patthana3.2:1.1.pli: Sahetukaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sahetuko kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana3.2:2.1.pli: Sahetukaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sahetuko kusalo dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.2:3.1.pli: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ, adhipatiyā ekaṃ, anantare ekaṃ, samanantare ekaṃ, sahajāte ekaṃ, aññamaññe ekaṃ, nissaye ekaṃ, upanissaye ekaṃ, purejāte ekaṃ, āsevane ekaṃ, kamme ekaṃ, āhāre ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.2:4.1.pli: Sahetukaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sahetuko kusalo dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.2:5.1.pli: Naadhipatiyā ekaṃ, napurejāte ekaṃ, napacchājāte ekaṃ, naāsevane ekaṃ, nakamme ekaṃ, navipāke ekaṃ, navippayutte ekaṃ. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.2:8.1.pli: (Sahajātavāropi paccayavāropi nissayavāropi saṃsaṭṭhavāropi sampayuttavāropi paṭiccavārasadisā vitthāretabbā.)

patthana3.2:9.1.pli: Sahetuko kusalo dhammo sahetukassa kusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.

patthana3.2:10.1.pli: Sahetuko kusalo dhammo sahetukassa kusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.2:11.1.pli: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ, adhipatiyā ekaṃ, anantare ekaṃ, samanantare ekaṃ, sahajāte ekaṃ, aññamaññe ekaṃ, nissaye ekaṃ, upanissaye ekaṃ, āsevane ekaṃ, kamme ekaṃ, āhāre ekaṃ, indriye ekaṃ, jhāne ekaṃ, magge ekaṃ, sampayutte ekaṃ, atthiyā ekaṃ, natthiyā ekaṃ, vigate ekaṃ, avigate ekaṃ. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.2:12.1.pli: Sahetuko kusalo dhammo sahetukassa kusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo.

patthana3.2:16.1.pli: (Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṃ, evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.)

patthana3.2:17.1.pli: Sahetukaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sahetuko akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana3.2:18.1.pli: Ahetukaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sahetuko akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana3.2:19.1.pli: Sahetukaṃ akusalañca ahetukaṃ akusalañca dhammaṃ paṭicca sahetuko akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana3.2:20.1.pli: Sahetukaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sahetuko akusalo dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā. Sahetukaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ahetuko akusalo dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā. Sahetukaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sahetuko akusalo ca ahetuko akusalo ca dhammā uppajjanti ārammaṇapaccayā.

patthana3.2:21.1.pli: Ahetukaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sahetuko akusalo dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā.

patthana3.2:22.1.pli: Sahetukaṃ akusalañca ahetukaṃ akusalañca dhammaṃ paṭicca sahetuko akusalo dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā.

patthana3.2:23.1.pli: Sahetukaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sahetuko akusalo dhammo uppajjati adhipatipaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.2:24.1.pli: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe pañca, adhipatiyā ekaṃ, anantare pañca, samanantare pañca, sahajāte pañca, aññamaññe pañca, nissaye pañca, upanissaye pañca, purejāte pañca, āsevane pañca, kamme pañca, āhāre pañca, indriye pañca, jhāne pañca, magge pañca, sampayutte pañca, vippayutte pañca, atthiyā pañca, natthiyā pañca, vigate pañca, avigate pañca. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.2:25.1.pli: Sahetukaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ahetuko akusalo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā.

patthana3.2:26.1.pli: Sahetukaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sahetuko akusalo dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.2:27.1.pli: Nahetuyā ekaṃ, naadhipatiyā pañca, napurejāte pañca, napacchājāte pañca, naāsevane pañca, nakamme tīṇi, navipāke pañca, navippayutte pañca. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.2:30.1.pli: (Sahajātavāropi paccayavāropi nissayavāropi saṃsaṭṭhavāropi sampayuttavāropi paṭiccavārasadisā vitthāretabbā.)

patthana3.2:31.1.pli: Sahetuko akusalo dhammo sahetukassa akusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … dve.

patthana3.2:32.1.pli: Sahetuko akusalo dhammo sahetukassa akusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.

patthana3.2:33.1.pli: Ahetuko akusalo dhammo ahetukassa akusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.

patthana3.2:34.1.pli: Sahetuko akusalo ca ahetuko akusalo ca dhammā sahetukassa akusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.

patthana3.2:35.1.pli: Sahetuko akusalo dhammo sahetukassa akusalassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇādhipati, sahajātādhipati. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.2:36.1.pli: Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā ekaṃ, anantare nava, samanantare nava, sahajāte pañca, aññamaññe pañca, nissaye pañca, upanissaye nava, āsevane nava, kamme tīṇi, āhāre tīṇi, indriye tīṇi, jhāne tīṇi, magge tīṇi, sampayutte pañca, atthiyā pañca, natthiyā nava, vigate nava, avigate pañca. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.2:37.1.pli: Sahetuko akusalo dhammo sahetukassa akusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.2:41.1.pli: (Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṃ, evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.)

patthana3.2:42.1.pli: Sahetukaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sahetuko abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana3.2:43.1.pli: Ahetukaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ahetuko abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana3.2:45.1.pli: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe cattāri, adhipatiyā pañca, anantare cattāri, samanantare cattāri, sahajāte nava, aññamaññe cha …pe… purejāte dve, āsevane dve, kamme nava, vipāke nava …pe… vippayutte nava …pe… avigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.2:46.1.pli: Ahetukaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ahetuko abyākato dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā.

patthana3.2:47.1.pli: Sahetukaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ahetuko abyākato dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā.

patthana3.2:48.1.pli: Ahetukaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ahetuko abyākato dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā.

patthana3.2:49.1.pli: Sahetukaṃ abyākatañca ahetukaṃ abyākatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca ahetuko abyākato dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā.

patthana3.2:50.1.pli: Sahetukaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sahetuko abyākato dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.2:51.1.pli: Nahetuyā ekaṃ, naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā nava, naanantare tīṇi, nasamanantare tīṇi, naaññamaññe tīṇi, naupanissaye tīṇi, napurejāte nava, napacchājāte nava, naāsevane nava, nakamme dve, navipāke pañca, naāhāre ekaṃ, naindriye ekaṃ, najhāne ekaṃ, namagge ekaṃ, nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte dve, nonatthiyā tīṇi, novigate tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.2:54.1.pli: (Sahajātavāropi paccayavāropi nissayavāropi saṃsaṭṭhavāropi sampayuttavāropi paṭiccavārasadisā vitthāretabbā.)

patthana3.2:56.1.pli: Sahetuko abyākato dhammo sahetukassa abyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.2:57.1.pli: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe cattāri, adhipatiyā cattāri, anantare cattāri, samanantare cattāri, sahajāte satta, aññamaññe cha, nissaye satta, upanissaye cattāri, purejāte dve, pacchājāte dve, āsevane dve, kamme cattāri, vipāke cattāri, āhāre cattāri, indriye cattāri, jhāne cattāri, magge tīṇi, sampayutte dve, vippayutte tīṇi, atthiyā satta …pe… avigate satta. patthana3.2:120.1.pli: Hetuñceva sahetukañca kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu ceva sahetuko ca kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana3.2:122.1.pli: Hetuñceva sahetukañca kusalañca sahetukañceva na ca hetuṃ kusalañca dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu ceva sahetuko ca kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.2:123.1.pli: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava …pe… kamme nava, āhāre nava …pe… avigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.2:125.1.pli: Naadhipatiyā nava, napurejāte nava, napacchājāte nava, naāsevane nava, nakamme tīṇi, navipāke nava, navippayutte nava. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.2:128.1.pli: (Sahajātavāropi paccayavāropi nissayavāropi saṃsaṭṭhavāropi sampayuttavāropi paṭiccavārasadisā vitthāretabbā.)

patthana3.2:129.1.pli: Hetu ceva sahetuko ca kusalo dhammo hetussa ceva sahetukassa ca kusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.2:130.1.pli: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava, anantare nava, samanantare nava, sahajāte nava, aññamaññe nava, nissaye nava, upanissaye nava, āsevane nava, kamme tīṇi, āhāre tīṇi, indriye nava, jhāne tīṇi, magge sampayutte nava …pe… avigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.2:131.1.pli: Hetu ceva sahetuko ca kusalo dhammo hetussa ceva sahetukassa ca kusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.2:135.1.pli: (Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṃ, evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.)

patthana3.2:136.1.pli: Hetuñceva sahetukañca akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu ceva sahetuko ca akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.2:137.1.pli: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava …pe… kamme nava, āhāre nava …pe… avigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.2:138.1.pli: Hetuñceva sahetukañca akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu ceva sahetuko ca akusalo dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā … nava. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.2:139.1.pli: Naadhipatiyā nava, napurejāte nava, napacchājāte nava, naāsevane nava, nakamme tīṇi, navipāke nava, navippayutte nava. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.2:142.1.pli: (Sahajātavāropi paccayavāropi nissayavāropi saṃsaṭṭhavāropi sampayuttavāropi paṭiccavārasadisā vitthāretabbā.)

patthana3.2:143.1.pli: Hetu ceva sahetuko ca akusalo dhammo hetussa ceva sahetukassa ca akusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.2:144.1.pli: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe nava …pe… āsevane nava, kamme tīṇi, āhāre tīṇi, indriye jhāne magge tīṇi, sampayutte nava …pe… avigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.2:145.1.pli: Hetu ceva sahetuko ca akusalo dhammo hetussa ceva sahetukassa ca akusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo.

patthana3.2:146.1.pli: Nahetuyā nava, naārammaṇe nava …pe… noavigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.2:149.1.pli: (Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṃ, evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.)

patthana3.2:150.1.pli: Hetuñceva sahetukañca abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu ceva sahetuko ca abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.2:151.1.pli: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava …pe… kamme nava, vipāke nava …pe… avigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.2:152.1.pli: Hetuñceva sahetukañca abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu ceva sahetuko ca abyākato dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.2:153.1.pli: Naadhipatiyā nava, napurejāte nava, napacchājāte nava, naāsevane nava, nakamme tīṇi, navipāke nava, navippayutte nava. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.2:156.1.pli: (Sahajātavāropi paccayavāropi nissayavāropi saṃsaṭṭhavāropi sampayuttavāropi paṭiccavārasadisā vitthāretabbā.)

patthana3.2:157.1.pli: Hetu ceva sahetuko ca abyākato dhammo hetussa ceva sahetukassa ca abyākatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.2:158.1.pli: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava, anantare nava, samanantare nava, sahajāte nava, aññamaññe nava, nissaye nava, upanissaye nava, āsevane nava, kamme tīṇi, vipāke nava, āhāre tīṇi, indriye nava, jhāne tīṇi, magge sampayutte nava …pe… avigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.2:159.1.pli: Hetu ceva sahetuko ca abyākato dhammo hetussa ceva sahetukassa ca abyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.2:163.1.pli: (Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṃ, evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.)

patthana3.2:165.1.pli: Hetuñceva hetusampayuttañca kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu ceva hetusampayutto ca kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuñceva hetusampayuttañca kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetusampayutto ceva na ca hetu kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.2:166.1.pli: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava …pe… avigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.2:167.1.pli: Hetuñceva hetusampayuttañca kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu ceva hetusampayutto ca kusalo dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.2:168.1.pli: Naadhipatiyā nava, napurejāte nava, napacchājāte nava, naāsevane nava, nakamme tīṇi, navipāke nava, navippayutte nava. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.2:171.1.pli: (Sahajātavāropi paccayavāropi nissayavāropi saṃsaṭṭhavāropi sampayuttavāropi paṭiccavārasadisā vitthāretabbā.)

patthana3.2:172.1.pli: Hetu ceva hetusampayutto ca kusalo dhammo hetussa ceva hetusampayuttassa ca kusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.2:173.1.pli: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava, anantare nava …pe… āsevane nava, kamme tīṇi, āhāre tīṇi, indriye nava, jhāne tīṇi, magge sampayutte nava …pe… avigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.2:174.1.pli: Hetu ceva hetusampayutto ca kusalo dhammo hetussa ceva hetusampayuttassa ca kusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.2:178.1.pli: (Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṃ, evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.)

patthana3.2:179.1.pli: Hetuñceva hetusampayuttañca akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu ceva hetusampayutto ca akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.2:180.1.pli: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava …pe… avigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.2:181.1.pli: Hetuñceva hetusampayuttañca akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu ceva hetusampayutto ca akusalo dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.2:182.1.pli: Naadhipatiyā nava, napurejāte nava, napacchājāte nava, naāsevane nava, nakamme tīṇi, navipāke nava, navippayutte nava. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.2:185.1.pli: (Sahajātavāropi paccayavāropi nissayavāropi saṃsaṭṭhavāropi sampayuttavāropi paṭiccavārasadisā vitthāretabbā.)

patthana3.2:186.1.pli: Hetu ceva hetusampayutto ca akusalo dhammo hetussa ceva hetusampayuttassa ca akusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.2:187.1.pli: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava …pe… āsevane nava, kamme tīṇi, āhāre tīṇi, indriye jhāne magge tīṇi, sampayutte nava …pe… avigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.2:188.1.pli: Hetu ceva hetusampayutto ca akusalo dhammo hetussa ceva hetusampayuttassa ca akusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.2:192.1.pli: (Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṃ, evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.)

patthana3.2:193.1.pli: Hetuñceva hetusampayuttañca abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu ceva hetusampayutto ca abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.2:194.1.pli: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava …pe… kamme nava, vipāke nava …pe… avigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.2:195.1.pli: Hetuñceva hetusampayuttañca abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu ceva hetusampayutto ca abyākato dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.2:196.1.pli: Naadhipatiyā nava, napurejāte nava, napacchājāte nava, naāsevane nava, nakamme tīṇi, navipāke nava, navippayutte nava. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.2:199.1.pli: (Sahajātavāropi paccayavāropi nissayavāropi saṃsaṭṭhavāropi sampayuttavāropi paṭiccavārasadisā vitthāretabbā.)

patthana3.2:200.1.pli: Hetu ceva hetusampayutto ca abyākato dhammo hetussa ceva hetusampayuttassa ca abyākatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.2:201.1.pli: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava …pe… āsevane nava, kamme tīṇi, vipāke nava, āhāre tīṇi, indriye nava, jhāne tīṇi, magge sampayutte nava …pe… avigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.2:202.1.pli: Hetu ceva hetusampayutto ca abyākato dhammo hetussa ceva hetusampayuttassa ca abyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.2:206.1.pli: (Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṃ, evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.)

patthana3.2:208.1.pli: Nahetuṃ sahetukaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu sahetuko kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.2:209.1.pli: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ (sabbattha ekaṃ), avigate ekaṃ.

patthana3.2:210.1.pli: Naadhipatiyā ekaṃ, napurejāte ekaṃ …pe… navipāke ekaṃ, navippayutte ekaṃ. (Pañhāvārepi sabbattha ekaṃ.)

patthana3.2:211.1.pli: Nahetuṃ sahetukaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu sahetuko akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.2:212.1.pli: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ (sabbattha ekaṃ), avigate ekaṃ. (Hetupaccayo natthi. Pañhāvārepi sabbattha ekaṃ, pañhāvārepi imesaṃ tiṇṇannaṃ hetupaccayo natthi.)

patthana3.2:213.1.pli: Nahetuṃ sahetukaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu sahetuko abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nahetuṃ sahetukaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu ahetuko abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nahetuṃ sahetukaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu sahetuko abyākato ca nahetu ahetuko abyākato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.

patthana3.2:214.1.pli: Nahetuṃ ahetukaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu ahetuko abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana3.2:215.1.pli: Nahetuṃ sahetukaṃ abyākatañca nahetuṃ ahetukaṃ abyākatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu sahetuko abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.2:216.1.pli: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe cattāri, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… purejāte āsevane dve, kamme nava, vipāke nava …pe… avigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.2:217.1.pli: Nahetuṃ ahetukaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu ahetuko abyākato dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.2:218.1.pli: Nahetuyā ekaṃ, naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā nava, naanantare tīṇi, nasamanantare tīṇi, naaññamaññe tīṇi, naupanissaye tīṇi, napurejāte nava, napacchājāte nava, naāsevane nava, nakamme dve, navipāke pañca, naāhāre ekaṃ, naindriye ekaṃ, najhāne ekaṃ, namagge ekaṃ, nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte dve, nonatthiyā tīṇi, novigate tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.2:221.1.pli: (Sahajātavāropi paccayavāropi nissayavāropi saṃsaṭṭhavāropi sampayuttavāropi paṭiccavārasadisā vitthāretabbā.)

patthana3.2:222.1.pli: Nahetu sahetuko abyākato dhammo nahetussa sahetukassa abyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.2:223.1.pli: Ārammaṇe cattāri, adhipatiyā cattāri, anantare cattāri, samanantare cattāri, sahajāte satta, aññamaññe cha, nissaye satta, upanissaye cattāri, purejāte dve, pacchājāte dve, āsevane dve, kamme cattāri, vipāke cattāri, āhāre cattāri, indriye cattāri, jhāne cattāri, magge tīṇi, sampayutte dve, vippayutte tīṇi, atthiyā satta, natthiyā cattāri, vigate cattāri, avigate satta. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.2:224.1.pli: Nahetu sahetuko abyākato dhammo nahetussa sahetukassa abyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.2:228.1.pli: (Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṃ, evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.)
